items.sentence: Tom and Mary were just sitting and drinking coffee.
Tom won't likely be able to persuade Mary to drive.
Tom will probably be awake by the time I get there.
Tom picked up the broken glass and put it in a box.
Tom probably won't be able to answer that question.
The shirt Tom was wearing didn't fit him very well.
Tom didn't even know that I used to live in Boston.
Not everyone had time to do what they needed to do.
Our dog whines at the door when it wants in or out.
The first pears were already falling from the tree.
